name: Name
verify-email-message: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
reset-password-message: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
create-workspace-subtitle: Enhance your efficiency by streamlining access to boards, making them conveniently accessible from a centralized location for everyone.
workspace-name-text: This is the name of your company, team or organization.
workspace-description-text: Briefly introduce your Workspace to engage your members.
public-workspace-text: Visible to every users including guests.
create-board-subtitle: Centralized board hub for streamlined collaboration.
board-name-text: This is the name of your project, team or organization.
board-description-text: Briefly introduce your Workspace to engage your members.
public-board-text: Visible to every users including guests.
contact-us-for-problem: If the problem persist please contact us.
empty-workspace-title: This workspace doesn't have any board yet.
empty-workspace-subtitle: Start by creating a board in your workspace.
invite-to-workspace-subtitle: Unlock the Power of Teamwork by Inviting Members to Your Workspace
invite-to-board-subtitle: Unlock the Power of Teamwork by Inviting Members to Your Board
search-by-username-or-email: Search by name or email address
default-invitation-message: Join now and let's work together.
worksapce-invitation-message-placeholder: Message that will be atttached to invitation.
invite-members-no-options: There is not results to shose.
